verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*; let \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* throned \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w cherubs|strong="H3742"\w*; let earth \w quake|strong="H7264"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H1931"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w your|strong="H3372"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* loves \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w equity|strong="H4339"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w*: \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w*. \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Among|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* commands \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* forgiveness \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w suffered|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w deeds|strong="H5949"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* unpunished.
